thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Ron Edgerley
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Ron Edgerley

author: Ron Edgerley
title: Ron Edgerley
text: My wife and I used Costa Rican Vacations to plan our trip to Costa Rica. Robin Sabine was our travel consultant and she planned a great trip for us. Robin booked all of our hotels, transportation and tours. Booking the trip was easy and the trip itself was magnificent. Everything ran smoothly and we never had a single issue. The accommodations were excellent. The tours were informative and fun and the transportation that was provided for us was terrific. We would highly recommend Costa Rican Vacations to help with your Costa Rica trip. Robin planned a great itinerary for us and we thoroughly enjoyed our time in Costa Rica.
